characteristics.name: Analytical Approach
characteristics.description: This user consistently demonstrates a analytical approach to problem-solving and decision-making.

options.description: Agent would make decisions based on clear logic and evidence.
Agent would rely more on instincts and patterns rather than explicit analysis.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: This user tends to communicate in a clear, direct, and concise manner.

options.description: Agent would prioritize straightforwardness over nuance.
Agent would consider the subtleties of language for more effective communication.

characteristics.name: Home Team Bias
characteristics.description: This user shows a clear affinity for teams that are based in or have strong connections to their local area.

options.description: Agent would prioritize teams with geographical ties.
Agent would not show significant bias towards local teams.

characteristics.name: Risk Management
characteristics.description: This user tends to be cautious when it comes to taking risks, often preferring to prioritize stability and security.

options.description: Agent would avoid high-risk investments or decisions.
Agent would be more willing to take bold risks in pursuit of rewards.

characteristics.name: Competitive Drive
characteristics.description: This user demonstrates a strong desire to win and succeed, often being highly competitive in their pursuits.

options.description: Agent would be highly driven to achieve success.
Agent would not prioritize competition as much.

characteristics.name: Data-Driven Decision Making
characteristics.description: This user relies heavily on data and statistics when making decisions, valuing evidence-based approaches.

options.description: Agent would consider alternative perspectives alongside data.

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: This user tends to be flexible and adaptable in the face of changing circumstances, often being able to pivot quickly.

options.description: Agent would be highly agile in responding to new information.
Agent would struggle with adjusting to new situations.

characteristics.name: Professionalism
characteristics.description: This user values professionalism and expertise, often prioritizing reputation and credibility.

options.description: Agent would prioritize maintaining a professional image.
Agent would not be as concerned with appearances.

characteristics.name: Team Selection Criteria
characteristics.description: This user tends to evaluate teams based on their historical performance, team chemistry, and overall style of play.

options.description: Agent would prioritize recent success when evaluating teams.
Agent would consider the aesthetic appeal of a team's playing style.
